description:
Kawachi makes “Singing” French bread, while Suwabara rises to the challenge with his “Dancing” French bread. Will this match end with… a draw?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dernier match ! Les pains qui chantent et dansent !
Shinjinsen Saishuu Jiai!! Utatte Odoru France Pan!
The Rookie Competition`s Final Match!! Singing and Dancing French Bread!
ปิดฉากการแข่งศึกหน้าใหม่!! ขนมปังฝรั่งเศสร้องเพลงเต้นรำ!
新人戦最終試合!! 歌って踊るフランスパン!
